code: import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Form(_ref){let{onAdd}=_ref;function HandleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();if(!description)return;const newItem={description,quantity,packed:false,id:Date.now()};onAdd(newItem);setdescription("");setquantity(1);console.log("Item added:",newItem);}const[description,setdescription]=useState("");const[quantity,setquantity]=useState(1);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"add-form",onSubmit:HandleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Pick your things... \uD83D\uDED2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:Number(quantity),onChange:e=>setquantity(Number(e.target.value)),children:Array.from({length:20},(_,i)=>i+1).map(num=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:num,children:num},num))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Item...",value:description,onChange:e=>setdescription(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add"})]});}
